QuestData.Title: Fair Warning
QuestData.Description: The ogron here are far from brilliant, but they are more intelligent than the gronn. They're large, and even stronger than they look.$b$bTheir leader, Borogahn, is especially formidable. Despite several fights, I have not yet managed to kill him.$b$bHeed my words, friend. Take caution as you explore their lair.$b$bNisha is ready to move. Ask her to take you to the mouth of the cave, and I'm sure she would be happy to.
QuestData.RewardText: Most people cannot handle ogron in single combat.
